attr.title: Walthros: Renewal
attr.desc: Make some friends, eat some burgers, and unearth terrible secrets from the depths of space. Frog and Toad meet Cosmic Horror. A turn-based RPG with a kind-hearted doofus trying to make tough times a little easier.
attr.inst: Purchase the game from https://super-walrus-games.itch.io/walthros-renewal and download the Windows version (Linux should work fine, too). Copy the game files named walthrosrenewal.rpg and BurpinBros.rpg to the port directory. Alternatively, you could play the DEMO version (also on the itch page) -- but rename the walthrosDEMO.rpg file to walthrosrenewal.rpg
attr.inst_md: Purchase the game from [https://super-walrus-games.itch.io/walthros-renewal](https://super-walrus-games.itch.io/walthros-renewal) and download the Windows version (Linux should work fine, too). Copy the game files named *walthrosrenewal.rpg* and *BurpinBros.rpg* to the port directory. Alternatively, you could play the DEMO version (also on the itch page) -- but rename the *walthrosDEMO.rpg* file to *walthrosrenewal.rpg*
